mapper.sql: id, type,gift_tag_id, gift_name, original_price, activity_price, special_effect, bestowed, animation_type, animation_url, animation_length, create_time, sort,image_url,sort,flag
mapper.select:
select
from t_funtime_gift where bestowed = #{bestowed} and flag = 1 order by sort

select t.id, t.type ,t.gift_tag_id giftTagId ,g.tag_name tagName , t.gift_name giftName, t.special_effect specialEffect, t.original_price originalPrice, t.activity_price activityPrice,t.image_url imageUrl, t.animation_type animationType, t.animation_url animationUrl, t.animation_length animationLength, k.item_num itemNum from t_funtime_gift t inner join t_funtime_tag g on t.gift_tag_id = g.id inner join t_funtime_user_knapsack k on k.item_id = t.id and k.type = 1 where k.user_id = #{userId}

select t.id, t.type ,t.gift_tag_id giftTagId ,g.tag_name tagName , t.gift_name giftName, t.special_effect specialEffect, t.original_price originalPrice, t.activity_price activityPrice,t.image_url imageUrl, t.animation_type animationType, t.animation_url animationUrl, t.animation_length animationLength from t_funtime_gift t inner join t_funtime_tag g on t.gift_tag_id = g.id where t.flag = 1 and t.type = 1 order by t.sort

select t.id,t.type,t.gift_name giftName,t.animation_type animationtype, t.animation_url animationUrl,sum(d.num) numTotal,sum(d.amount) amountTotal ,t.original_price originalPrice, t.activity_price activityprice,t.image_url imageUrl from t_funtime_gift t inner join t_funtime_user_account_gifttrans_record d on t.id = d.gift_id where d.user_id = #{userId} group by t.id
